# Order to Revenue object model

The Order to Revenue object model outlines the relationships between various objects, including Booking, Billing, and Revenue Recognition Events Transactions. Refer to the diagram for a visual summary and explore further details in the related sections.

The following diagram summarizes the objects and their relationships in the Order to Revenue solution.

![Order to Revenue Object Model](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/cfc0814a-8747-4382-9f0c-7820b5528edd?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Uis6nsylOOl9avEtL56nOSffhSzgVwRhwePtYvMyIJg)

For more information about the Order to Revenue objects, see:

-   Booking Transactions

-   Billing Transactions

-   Revenue Recognition Events Transactions


For more information about Zuora Revenue, see Overview of Zuora Revenue .

For more information about the other objects, see the Zuora business object model .
